mapper.select: SELECT p.PLACE_NAME,p.REGION, t.TAG_ID FROM PLACE p JOIN PLACE_TAGS t ON p.place_id = t.place_id ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE
SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTR(ADDRESS,'1',INSTR(ADDRESS,' ',1,1)-1) ADDRESS FROM PLACE
SELECT p.THUMBNAIL_HREF,c.COURSE_NAME, c.REGION, o.AVG_COST FROM course c , course_order o , PLACE p WHERE c.COURSE_ID = o.COURSE_ID AND o.PLACE_ID = p.PLACE_ID AND c.region = #{address}
